Magna Info Tech] Project 1: Implementation & Support of EWM Project 2: Johannesburg Distribution Center - WM/SD/MM Support • Involved in Business requirement Gathering for setting up a new warehouse. Understanding the AS-IS Business Process of the current distribution facility by Interacting with the Key business users. • Prepared Blue print of the new warehouse facility by understanding and Mapping the Business Process to the SAP EWM module. • Involved in configuration and maintenance of goods issue processes, Storage type search strategies for Put away and picking based on the Business design for receiving and delivery process. • Configured the Stock Removal Control Indicators, Storage type sequences, Storage Section Indicators, Bin Type Indicators and storage process steps. • Training the users for carrying out their warehouse activities and using the warehouse monitor to view outbound and inbound transaction results. • Involved in WM RF screen developments and configurations. • Identify and debug defects in BO report - 'TU Zero Weight' and Emergency Charge Waiving issue and Worked on Partial Invoicing change. • Worked on a CR to create unique pack with number for URG Orders, based on Dealer PO. • Set up new storage types that were extended as a part of Rearrangement process in JDC warehouse. • Provide Post-Go Live Incident support and involved in both technical & functional changes. • Delivered 13 CRs for the year 2015 and 6 CRs till June 2016.
